EmailTemplate.name: 17.ComColl.SDP.none.N.G.N.14762.SDP Pilot campaign.SSE_ENG_5_IHS_Report
EmailTemplate.subject: Analyst Report: Architect for service enablement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Diane Myers - Architecting for secure service enablement Facing rapid industry change, network engineers need to work hard to keep ahead of growing requirements. With the move to IMS architectures, service providers now have a unique opportunity to add the capacity and new services they need, while remaining agile to prepare future evolution.
The IHS Markit report, written by Diane Myers, reveals findings on:
- Key market and technology trends for IMS and IP-based services - The architecture required for service enablement - The components for enabling secure, reliable, high-performing services Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Secure Service Enablement Marketing, Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
